title: can we bring back ahris old charm passive?
body: Shes really weak in the laning phase in comparison to zed, ekko, brand, malz, karma, lb, ect and if she had her old passive back it would probably make her completely playable again.{{champion:103}}

replies.body:
Weak in the landing phase?
she is one of (if not THE) most spammable champs (especially early), she has tiny mana costs, lots of sustain, her ult is a get out of jail free card in a gank, and if you get caught in her charm, by the time it ends half your hp is gone, and if you get charmed during a gank its game over for you.

so how exactly is she "really weak in the laning phase"?

She has a 16.5% pick rate (the single highest pick rate of any mage in the game) and a 53% win rate (one of the highest in the game)
so when you say "probably make her completely playable again" i say to you (and i don't mean to be rude):

What the fuck are you talking about?

You say she has low mana costs but she has 330~ ish mana early and her lvl 1 q costs 65 mana. That's like using your q 5 times then you're out of mana. By the time you hit level 6, the enemy jungler would have already ganked once, if not twice.

Again, her passive at lower levels isn't as effective as it used to be (thanks to all the nerfs), and with those 5 q's you aren't going to be able to get much sustain off of it.

Throwing out charms in laning phase is already a bad idea imo, costing 85 mana at all ranks, and if you were to hit a charm and try to chunk their health, running out of mana is usually what happens. A full combo at level 5 costs (if you are maxing q first) 210 of your 490 mana that is probably already gone if you've been using that "lots of sustain" passive. 

Getting ganked by someone, say, {{champion:254}} , and this happens:

1. Vi charges q
2. Ahri charms her in the middle of casting it, and in this leaves room for the other laner to come in and stun (if they are leblanc, syndra, anivia, twisted fate, etc.)
3. Ahri gets stunned
4. Full combo'd by the enemy laner
5. Ahri flashes out OR dies from the jungler walking up and finishing her off.

In the end, ahri doesnt have a strong laning phase compared to someone like {{champion:90}} or {{champion:30}} , but if you can get past that, her late game is amazing. 

<3 {{champion:103}}

And yet dispite that, "thanks to all those nerfs" she still has a 53% Winrate and a 16.5% pick rate.

Plus all ahri's still spam Q every time it's off cooldown and they never run out of mana, especially once they start buying.

And in your Vi gank analogy you forgot to press R three times.

I won't hear anyone say she is weak or disadvantaged, 
If ahri gets ganked she's more likely to survive than if a TF or a Karthus etc etc, you can't dispute that. Obviously she can't survive every single gank because then she would be so broken that riot would even have to admit it. But she can survive a hell of a lot more than most.

I said the vi gank analogy that all this happens at level 5 because from my experince i get ganked a lot at level 5. Once she starts buying items she's out of laning phase, which is what we've been arguing about this whole time. Again, she has a stong post-laning phase, and a weak laning phase. 

An easy way to kill her is to all-in her when she has no mana left, and you'll read that on just about every guide out there as far as counters go.

Ahri has a great laning phase, she can do well against most anyone.
She has good wave clear with a bit of AP, great burst, fantastic mobility with her ult and Q to help escape from ganks or chase someone down, and she has sustain on top of all that.

Ahri was easily the best Solo queue mid laner for season 5 ever since patch 5.2. And even in Season 6, she's easily in the top 5, if not just sitting outside it..... What in the world do you mean it would make her playable again?.....
